tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InsurancePolicy (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(255),
    policy_holder VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    coverage_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Policy ( 
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  policy_holder_name VARCHAR(50), 
  policy_type VARCHAR(50), 
  coverage_amount DECIMAL(10,2), 
  start_date DATE, 
  end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyClaim ( 
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  policy_id INT REFERENCES Policy(policy_id), 
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2), 
  claim_date DATE, 
  claim_status VARCHAR(20) 
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id UUID REFERENCES Insurance_Companies(company_id),
  policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  premium DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Policy_Holders (
  policy_holder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID REFERENCES Policies(policy_id),
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
  claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID REFERENCES Policies(policy_id),
  claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE policy (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_type VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    premium DECIMAL(10,2),
    policy_holder_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_holder_id) REFERENCES policy_holder(id)
);

CREATE TABLE claim (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description VARCHAR(255),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    policy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agent (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(255),
    agent_email VARCHAR(255),
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES insurance_company(company_id)
);
